jobDescription: We are seeking a Data Analyst with strong quantitative skills to analyze data collected from a three generation longitudinal family study of individuals at high and low risk for depression including clinical and neuroanatomical correlates of religiosity and spirituality.  The successful candidate will interact with senior and junior investigators and statisticians to analyze study data for presentations, reports and publications in scientific and medical journals.  This position requires working in a team with clinical investigators, a senior biostatistician and a data manager.
